summary: Can someone please explain to me what happened to lightbulbs.  When did we go from having cheap incandescent bulbs that fuelled our winter-nights with light to read by, to mercury-filled, evil planet-polluting $6 spotlights which, while they are supposed to last several times longer, don’t.  I ask because yet another bulb plinked out of existence...
title: A Candle by Night
